Slackbot Transcript Alerts

Get reminders when a SRCCON 2016 session with transcription is about to start.

We’re excited to be offering live transcription at SRCCON again this year. About half of our 2016 sessions will be transcribed (they’re all marked on the schedule), and we hope people feel able to take part even if they can’t join us in Portland.

We’ll send out alerts on Twitter when a transcribed session is about to start, but we’re also trying something new this year: Slack alerts. Add the “SRCCON Transcript Alerts” bot to your team Slack, and you’ll get a reminder and a link right to the live transcript as these sessions get ready to begin.

The "Add to Slack" button will ask you to authorize access for a team you belong to, and choose a channel to receive the alerts. That's it!

About SRCCON

SRCCON is a conference for developers, designers, and data analysts in newsrooms—and many others in allied roles and fields. Join us in Portland, OR, July 28 and 29 for two days of peer-to-peer sessions built around conversation and collaboration. Keep up with updates @SRCCON.

About OpenNews

Knight-Mozilla OpenNews is a joint project of Mozilla and the Knight Foundation that supports the growing community of news developers, designers, and data reporters helping journalism thrive on the open web. More at opennews.org and @OpenNews.
